name: Chromatic Fanatic
description:
Chromatic Fanatic.

An old school style action arcade game with simple controls and wave based survival.

In Chromatic Fanatic you play as a circle that runs around and gathers colors. Your stats increase as your circle gets more colorful. As the waves go on he enemy circles will gain more color as well.

Reach wave 10 to win and then continue on to see how far you can make it!

Controls.

WASD to move

Left Click to shoot

Scroll wheel to zoom out

ESC to pause
